attributes.action: sack Harriet Harman for calling Fidel Castro "a hero of the left"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Harriet Harman should immediately resign or be forced to vacate office for her assertion that Fidel Castro was "a hero of the left" rather than identifying him as a tyrant dictator guilty of mass murder, torture, crimes against humanity, drug trafficking, forgery, money laundering and kidnap.
